remarks: The functionalization is equal to the original function, if it is a function on the right base set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2015.)
statement:
staffval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
staffval.i $e |- .* = ( *r ` R ) $.
staffval.f $e |- .xb = ( *rf ` R ) $.
staffn $p |- ( .* Fn B -> .xb = .* ) $.
